Author: Swanabe
Text: Thank you:)   I don’t have any GI issues with this illness thank god, just a fever (that just broke) aches and an EXTREMELY sore throat. It totally sucks. I slept on and off all day and my sleep schedule is now royally fucked (fortunately I can work from home all this week on my own time).   I wasn’t able to do my IF and I gave up tracking calories. I’m calling it a cheat day and hoping that I haven’t done too much damage.

Author: tinyfleabite
Text: I'm so sorry you're sick--it must be super frustrating! Please try not to restrict, it only fucks up your progress and you might end up in hospital. If it helps, I had a fever a couple months back and a stomach flu. I dropped 7 pounds in two weeks. Granted, I ended up in the hospital and was kinda extreme, but your body burns sooo many more calories when sick!
